Plays > The Crossroads of Gappo

– Click image to view.

The Crossroads of Gappo

(摂州合邦辻) (Sesshū Gappō ga Tsuji)

Written By: Suga Sensuke (菅専助) , Wakatake Fuemi (若竹笛躬)

First Staged: 1773

Reference: Kokuritsu Gekijō jōen shiryōshū, edited by Kokuritsu Gekijō Geinō Chōsashitsu, vol. 164, May 1979; Keene, Donald, Bunraku: The Art of the Japanese Puppet Theatre (Tokyo: Kodansha International, 1973); Hironaga, Shūzaburō, The Bunraku Handbook (Tokyo: Maison des Arts, 1976); Bunraku September 1980 Performance Program

Kashira:

Masamune (正宗)

Baba (婆)

Wakaotoko (若男)

Musume (娘)

Kenbishi (検非違使)

Fukeoyama (老女形)

Oniwaka (鬼若)

Yokanbei (与勘平)

Darasuke (陀羅助)

Performances:

September 1971: The Crossroads of Gappo

July 1973: The Crossroads of Gappo

September 1973: The Crossroads of Gappo

January 1977: The Crossroads of Gappo

February 1978: The Crossroads of Gappo

May 1979: The Crossroads of Gappo

September 1980: The Crossroads of Gappo

January 1982: The Crossroads of Gappo

January 1986: The Crossroads of Gappo

December 1991: The Crossroads of Gappo

January 1993: The Crossroads of Gappo

January 1997: The Crossroads of Gappo

September 1998: The Crossroads of Gappo

April 2001: The Crossroads of Gappo

March/April 1988 Tour: The Crossroads of Gappo

Scenes:

The Attack in the Palace (殿中刃傷)

The Rowing Lesson (逆櫓)

The House of Kyosei 3 (喬生住家三より古心寺朱の丸柱の間)

Characters:

Tamate-Gozen (玉手御前)

Shuntokumaru (高安俊徳丸)

Heima (壺井平馬)

Zusho (桟図書)

Irihei, a servant (奴入平)

Gappo (合邦道心 (親合邦))

Asakahime (浅香姫)

Gappo's wife (合邦女房)

Jiromaru (高安次郎丸)
